analysis.description:
Lotthereum.closeRound (/unique_chucks/12/0xd64ad4eefaacb96a0865687cfeef4c4a2cfbfef2.sol#183-196) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- Lotthereum.balances
	- Lotthereum.games

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/12/0xd64ad4eefaacb96a0865687cfeef4c4a2cfbfef2.sol#203:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/12/0xd64ad4eefaacb96a0865687cfeef4c4a2cfbfef2.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.11 (/unique_chucks/12/0xd64ad4eefaacb96a0865687cfeef4c4a2cfbfef2.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_a' of Lotthereum.getNumber (/unique_chucks/12/0xd64ad4eefaacb96a0865687cfeef4c4a2cfbfef2.sol#204) is not in mixedCase
